QuestData.Title: Inspecting the Ruins
QuestData.Description: If you follow the road south from the village, and then west toward the Barrens, you'll come across the ruins of the Shady Rest Inn.$B$BTheramore has sent an investigator to discover how the inn met its fate. I had a man placed in that inn as a spy and I don't trust in the competence of these humans to uncover what happened.$B$BWhatever you find, don't give a scrap of it to that investigator. We'll handle this ourselves.
QuestData.LogDescription: Investigate the Shady Rest Inn in at the border of the Barrens in Dustwallow Marsh.
QuestData.RewardText: <The inspector regards you with what can only be disdain and distrust.>$B$BLeave this place be, errand boy, or I'll be sure to bring a contingent of guard with me next time to sink the lesson home.
